mapper.select: SELECT T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , COUNT(DISTINCT R.REVIEW_NO) AS SUM_REVIEW , ROUND((SUM(R.STAR)) / COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO), 1) AS AVG_STAR , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE , (SELECT AF.FILE_PATH FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS FILE_PATH , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_TNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE1 , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_CNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE2 FROM TRAINER T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(T.T_NO = O.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(O.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN AT_FILE AF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE T_METRO=#{searchTrainer} GROUP BY T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE

SELECT T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE , COUNT(DISTINCT R.REVIEW_NO) AS SUM_REVIEW , ROUND((SUM(R.STAR)) / COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO), 1) AS AVG_STAR , (SELECT AF.FILE_PATH FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS FILE_PATH , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_TNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE1 , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_CNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE2 FROM TRAINER T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(T.T_NO = O.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(O.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN AT_FILE AF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) GROUP BY T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE HAVING T.T_NO = #{tNo}

SELECT P.PT_NO , P.PT_DATE , P.USER_ID , P.T_NO , T.T_PRICE , T.T_AREA_INTRO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE FROM PT_ORDER P JOIN TRAINER T ON(P.T_NO = T.T_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE P.USER_ID=#{userNo}

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.STAR , R.R_CONTENT , R.R_DATE , R.MODIFY_DATE , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(R.PAY_NO = O.PAY_NO) JOIN TRAINER T ON(O.T_NO = T.T_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE T.T_NO = #{tNo} AND R.CATEGORY = 'PT'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE CATEGORY='PT'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , CATEGORY , STAR , R_CONTENT , R_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , PAY_NO , USER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , T_NO )VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , 'PT' , #{star} , #{rContent} , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{payNo} , #{userNo} , DEFAULT , #{tNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( PAY_NO , PAY_DATE , PAY_METHOD , ORDERER_PHONE , ORDERER_EMAIL , ORDER_STATUS , USER_NO , TOTAL_PRICE )VALUES ( SEQ_PAY_NO.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , 'card' , #{ordererPhone} , #{ordererEmail} , 'Y' , #{userNo} , #{totalPrice} )
INSERT INTO PT_ORDER ( PT_NO , PT_DATE , USER_ID , PAY_NO , T_NO )VALUES ( SEQ_PT_NO.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , #{userNo} , SEQ_PAY_NO.CURRVAL , #{productNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.T_NO , COUNT(DISTINCT O.PT_NO) , ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT O.PT_NO) DESC) AS RANK , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , COUNT(DISTINCT R.REVIEW_NO) AS SUM_REVIEW , ROUND((SUM(R.STAR)) / COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO), 1) AS AVG_STAR , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE , (SELECT AF.FILE_PATH FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS FILE_PATH , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_TNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='N' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE1 , (SELECT TF.F_NO FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS F_CNO , (SELECT AF.CHANGE_FILE FROM AT_FILE AF JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) AS CHANGE_FILE2 FROM TRAINER T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.T_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN PT_ORDER O ON(T.T_NO = O.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(O.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAINER_FILE TF ON(TF.T_NO = T.T_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN AT_FILE AF ON(AF.F_NO = TF.F_NO) GROUP BY T.T_NO , T.T_GYM_NAME , T.T_GYM_ADDRESS , T.T_AREA , T.T_METRO , T.T_AREA_INTRO , T.T_ONE_INTRO , T.T_PRICE , T.WEEKDAY_SC , T.WEEKAND_SC , T.T_INTRO , T.QUE_INTRO , M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , M.USER_PHONE) WHERE RANK <= 4
